response.overview: Three Stories focusing on different people navigating their way through life trying to survive the group of vampires who rule the world. Told out of order, the stories focus on an revenge driven murder and his unwilling partner, three average people accidently angering the vampires and a runaway vampire trying to keep a low profile
response.tagline: In a world ruled by vampires, survival is the only story worth telling
response.title: The Tales of The Vampire
